players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together as a team to identify the culprit."
Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie was innocent and we've already lost a quarter of our group. Alice, I agree we need to work together. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
Diana: "I agree with Alice that we need to work together. Let's focus on identifying any suspicious behavior or patterns among us."

You: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We don't have enough information yet to determine who the culprit is. Let's keep an open mind and pay close attention to any new information that comes up during the night or day."

Diana: "Let's not forget that we lost a valuable member of our team last night. We need to remain focused and work together to identify the culprit. I believe that trust is crucial in this situation, so let's be honest with each other about any information we..."

Bob: "Diana makes a good point about trust. I noticed Alice was quick to call for calm and not jumping to conclusions - that seems reasonable, but we do need to start narrowing things down. What are your thoughts on who we should focus on?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together as a team to identify the culprit."
Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie was innocent and we've already lost a quarter of our group. Alice, I agree we need to work together. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
